content.title: Introduction
content.content: Welcome to WhiteBirds! By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

content.title: Eligibility
content.content: You must be at least 18 years old to make purchases on our site. By using our services, you represent that you are at least 18 years of age.

content.title: Products & Availability
content.content: All products are subject to availability. We reserve the right to limit or cancel orders. Prices and product descriptions may change at any time without notice.

content.title: User Accounts
content.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. Any activities that occur under your account are your responsibility.

content.title: Termination
content.content: If you violate these Terms, we may terminate or suspend your access to our services immediately without prior notice.

content.title: Introduction
content.content: At WhiteBirds, your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

content.title: Data Collection
content.content: We collect data such as your name, email, and shipping address when you place an order. We also collect information about how you use our website.

content.title: Data Usage
content.content: Your data is used only for order fulfillment, customer support, and personalized recommendations. We may also use your data to improve our services.

content.title: Data Sharing
content.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share data with trusted service providers who assist in our operations.

content.title: Data Security
content.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

content.title: Introduction
content.content: WhiteBirds uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze website traffic. By using our website, you consent to our use of cookies.

content.title: Types of Cookies
content.content: We use essential cookies for site functionality, preference cookies to remember your settings, and analytics cookies to understand how visitors use our site.

content.title: Purpose of Cookies
content.content: Cookies help us remember your preferences and shopping cart items. They also allow us to analyze traffic patterns and improve our website.

content.title: Managing Cookies
content.content: You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not work properly. Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings.

content.title: Third-Party Cookies
content.content: We may also use third-party cookies for analytics and advertising purposes. These cookies are subject to the respective privacy policies of the third parties.
